categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Claw was a nickname that a male Human, son of Dariana Frayus of House Frayus of Alderaan, took after he turned to crime and became leader of his own gang. He started as a prankster, but then turned to kidnappings, demolitions and armed robberies, which caused his mother to put a bounty on his head.
